metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1000352 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In the Bouncy Castle JCE Provider version 1.55 and earlier the ECIES implementation allowed the use of ECB mode. This mode is regarded as unsafe and support for it has been removed from the provider.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This is an intrusive change to introduce to Ubuntu 14.04 LTS. Marking as ignored.

criterions.comment: bouncycastle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
